Package wwutil.sys

Interface Summary
FnUtil.ApplyFn<V> Callback function to work on a value and return a value of same type
FnUtil.ApplyFn2<V1,V2> Callback function to work on two parameters
FnUtil.FoldFn<R,I> Callback function to work on a value of type I and an accumulator of type R and return a value of type R
FnUtil.FoldMapFn<R,K,V>  
FnUtil.PredicateFn<V> Callback function to check a value satisfying the predicate
FnUtil.TransformFn<R,I> Callback function to work on a value of type I and return a value of type R
TlsMap.Factory<T>  
 

Class Summary
BaseXUtil Encoder for BaseX
FnUtil A simple class to add functional operations to make iteration easier.
IOUtil  
ReflectUtil  
TlsMap Thread local storage map
